product_name: adidas Ed Boulder Shorts - Men's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The adidas Ed Boulder Shorts are built like your favorite denim shorts but with added stretch so you feel free to jump for that high-flying Frisbee or put your tree-climbing skills to the test. Durable stretch denim fabric allows full range of motion while staying soft and comfortable. Traditional 5-pocket style. adidas Ed Boulder shorts feature a relaxed fit. Overstock.
